description:
Simon will talk about the principles, practice and pitfalls of creating Data Pipelines, as covered in our new Data Pipeline Playbook.

After his talk there will be an open discussion with Arron Maspero, Senior Delivery Manager, Office for National Statistics; Jon Vines
Engineering Lead, AO.com; Nadia Schmid, Director, EU Data Engineering & Analytics @ Wayfair and Lewis Crawford, Data Engineer, Equal Experts about their experiences with creating and using Data Pipelines in their own organisations.

**

SPEAKER:
Simon Case
Data Practice Lead, Equal Experts
**

PANELISTS:

Arron Maspero
Senior Delivery Manager, Office for National Statistics

Jon Vines
Engineering Lead, AO.com

Nadia Schmid
Director, EU Data Engineering & Analytics @ Wayfair

Lewis Crawford
Data Engineer, Equal Experts

***
This talk will be recorded and a link to the recording placed in the Comments shortly after the event
***
title: Principles, practice and pitfalls of creating Data Pipelines
